property.name: AmbientColorsX1
property.summary: Gets the colors of the ambient light in the negative X-axis direction.

property.name: AmbientColorsX2
property.summary: Gets the colors of the ambient light in the positive X-axis direction.

property.name: AmbientColorsY1
property.summary: Gets the colors of the ambient light in the negative Y-axis direction.

property.name: AmbientColorsY2
property.summary: Gets the colors of the ambient light in the positive Y-axis direction.

property.name: AmbientColorsZ1
property.summary: Gets the colors of the ambient light in the negative Z-axis direction.

property.name: AmbientColorsZ2
property.summary: Gets the colors of the ambient light in the positive Z-axis direction.

property.name: AuroraFollowsSun
property.summary: Gets or sets the value which determines whether the aurora follows the sun.

property.name: CloudLayers
property.summary: Retreives an enumerable collection of all cloud layers which can be iterated using a foreach construct.

property.name: Colors
property.summary: Retreives an enumerable collection of colors of all components which can be iterated using a foreach construct.

property.name: DayImageSpace
property.summary: Gets or sets the Image Space used during the day.

property.name: EditorId
property.summary: Gets or sets the Editor ID associated with this form.

property.name: EffectsAlwaysVisible
property.summary: Gets or sets the value which determines whether the Weather effects are always visible.

property.name: FogDayFar
property.summary: Gets or sets the far fog distance during the day.

property.name: FogDayMax
property.summary: Gets or sets the maximum fog distance during the night.

property.name: FogDayNear
property.summary: Gets or sets the near fog distance during the day.

property.name: FogDayPow
property.summary: Gets or sets the power of fog distance during the day.

property.name: FogNightFar
property.summary: Gets or sets the far fog distance during the night.

property.name: FogNightMax
property.summary: Gets or sets the maximum fog distance during the night.

property.name: FogNightNear
property.summary: Gets or sets the near fog distance during the night.

property.name: FogNightPow
property.summary: Gets or sets the power of fog distance during the night.

property.name: FormId
property.summary: Gets the Form ID associated with this form.

property.name: FresnelPowers
property.summary: Gets the Fresnel powers.

property.name: IsCloudy
property.summary: Gets or sets the value which determines whether this weather is cloudy.

property.name: IsPleasant
property.summary: Gets or sets the value which determines whether this weather is pleasant.

property.name: IsRainy
property.summary: Gets or sets the value which determines whether this weather is rainy.

property.name: IsSnowy
property.summary: Gets or sets the value which determines whether this weather is snowy.

property.name: LightningColor
property.summary: Gets or sets the color of the lightning during this Weather.

property.name: NightImageSpace
property.summary: Gets or sets the Image Space used during the night.

property.name: PrecipitationBeginFadeIn
property.summary: Gets or sets the point of transition into this Weather when the precipitation begins.

property.name: PrecipitationEndFadeOut
property.summary: Gets or sets the point of transition from this Weather when the precipitation ends.

property.name: PrecipitationParticle
property.summary: Gets or sets the Shader Particle Geometry used to render rain or snow.

property.name: SkyStatics
property.summary: Gets or sets the collection of Static objects which make up the sky dome of this Weather.

property.name: Sounds
property.summary: Gets or sets the collection of sounds associated with this Weather.

property.name: SpecularColors
property.summary: Gets the specular lighting colors.

property.name: SunDamage
property.summary: Gets or sets the multiplier of the damage caused by the sun to vampires.

property.name: SunGlare
property.summary: Gets or sets the sun glare intensity for this Weather.

property.name: SunriseImageSpace
property.summary: Gets or sets the Image Space used during the sunrise.

property.name: SunsetImageSpace
property.summary: Gets or sets the Image Space used during the sunset.

property.name: ThunderBeginFadeIn
property.summary: Gets or sets the point of transition into this Weather when the lightnings begins.

property.name: ThunderEndFadeOut
property.summary: Gets or sets the point of transition from this Weather when the lightnings ends.

property.name: ThunderFrequency
property.summary: Gets or sets the frequency of lightnings. The lesser value the more often lightnings occur.

property.name: TransDelta
property.summary: Gets or sets the transition delta of this Weather.

property.name: VisualEffect
property.summary: Gets or sets the Visual Effect for this Weather.

property.name: WindDirection
property.summary: Gets or sets the angle that specified the wind direction.

property.name: WindDirectionRange
property.summary: Gets or sets the angle that specifies the allowed deviation of wind direction.

property.name: WindSpeed
property.summary: Gets or sets the speed of wind for this Weather.

method.name: GetColors
method.summary: Retrieves the colors which define thespecified component of this Weather (0-16).

method.name: HasTag
method.summary: Determines whether this form has been tagged with the specified text.

method.name: Tag
method.summary: Tags this form with the specified text.
